Because Chrysler still owes about$ 5.8 billion to the U.S. government, lent under the Troubled Asset Relief Program, the U.S. Treasury can restrict senior management's compensation. It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly, CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call. which he resigned after a reporter and a private investigator were imprisoned for phone-tapping in 2007. In appointing Andy Coulson , David Cameron judged his experience and skills outweighed the political risk that the phone-tapping scandal might resurface. The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. He's now done the right thing but he should have done it earlier, Labour leader Ed Miliband told reporters.
